content.raw: The force torque values for the feet are reported at the `l_leg_uay`, `r_leg_uay` joint location, but in the `l_talus` and `r_talus` link frames, and the wrist force torque values are coming from the `l_arm_mwx` and `r_arm_mwx` joints, but reported in the `l_farm` and `r_farm` link frames.  Should I update them so the force/torque values are reported in `l_foot` and `r_foot` for foot force torque sensors, and similarly, `l_hand` and `r_hand` link frames for the wrist sensors?   Alternatively, I can update the [User Guide](http://gazebosim.org/w/index.php?title=DRC/UserGuide) to detail the location of the reported forces.  Thoughts?
content.html: The force torque values for the feet are reported at the l_leg_uay, r_leg_uay joint location, but in the l_talus and r_talus link frames, and the wrist force torque values are coming from the l_arm_mwx and r_arm_mwx joints, but reported in the l_farm and r_farm link frames. Should I update them so the force/torque values are reported in l_foot and r_foot for foot force torque sensors, and similarly, l_hand and r_hand link frames for the wrist sensors? Alternatively, I can update the User Guide to detail the location of the reported forces. Thoughts?
